entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -32.4°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Clearing early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this morning. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
